attributes.imagesize: '''House Lorch''' is a knightly house of the Westerlands. They are sworn to House Lannister of Casterly Rock.==Members==* Ser Amory Lorch, a knight in the service of Lord Tywin Lannister.<ref name="House Lannister viewers guide">http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/guide/houses/lannister/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 guide to houses, House Lannister entry</ref> Poisoned by Jaqen H'ghar at Arya Stark's behest.==History=====Season 2===Ser Amory Lorch fights for House Lannister during the War of the Five Kings.==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, the only known members of House Lorch are Ser Amory and Ser Lorent Lorch.==Image Gallery==<gallery>Amory 2x03.jpg
attributes.title: House Lorch
attributes.sigil: A black manticore on a red field

'''House Lorch''' is a knightly house of the [[Westerlands]]. They are sworn to [[House Lannister]] of [[Casterly Rock]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the only known members of House Lorch are Ser Amory and Ser Lorent Lorch.
sections.Members: * Ser {[[Amory Lorch]]}, a knight in the service of Lord [[Tywin Lannister]].<ref name="House Lannister viewers guide">[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/guide/houses/lannister/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 guide to houses, House Lannister entry]</ref> Poisoned by [[Jaqen H'ghar]] at [[Arya Stark]]'s behest.
sections.History:
===[[Season 2]]===

Ser Amory Lorch fights for [[House Lannister]] during the [[War of the Five Kings]].
